    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AbstractMessageSession
    Base class for protocol sessions that maintain request/response ordering state.
    AssembleCli
    Entry point for running the assemble pipeline over captured segments.
    AssembleConfig
    Configuration for the assemble CLI pipeline.
    AssembleUseCase
    Replays captured segment records to reconstruct higher-level protocol message pairs.
    AssembleUseCase.SegmentReaderFactory
    Factory for AssembleUseCase.SegmentRecordReader instances tied to an AssembleConfig input.
    AssembleUseCase.SegmentRecordReader
    Reader abstraction over a source of serialized SegmentRecords.
    BpfProgramStruct
    JNR representation of libpcap's struct bpf_program.
    Bytes
    Utility methods for reading unsigned integers from byte arrays.
    ByteStream
    Ordered slice of TCP bytes emitted by a flow assembler for a single direction.
    CaptureCli
    Entry point for packet capture using the RADAR port-based pipeline.
    CaptureConfig
    Configuration for the capture CLI, covering NIC selection, IO modes, and file rotation.
    CapturePropertiesLoader
    Utility for loading CaptureConfig from Java Properties streams.
    CliArgsParser
    Utility for turning key=value CLI arguments into a lookup map.
    ClockPort
    Provides access to wall-clock time for timestamping reconstructed events.
    CompositionRoot
    Temporary composition root used while migrating to the new architecture.
    Config
    Immutable runtime configuration shared across RADAR CLIs.
    ConfigLoader
    Loads Config instances from configuration files.
    ContextualFlowAssembler
    Flow assembler extension that receives explicit flow context with each segment.
    DefaultProtocolDetector
    Default detector leveraging enabled protocol modules, first matching by configured ports then falling back to signature heuristics.
    DisabledPacketSource
    Placeholder packet source used until the live CLI wires the real capture adapter.
    FilePosterOutputAdapter
    Writes poster reports to the filesystem using the legacy naming convention.
    FiveTuple
    Immutable five-tuple identifying a TCP flow (source/destination IP and port plus protocol label).
    FlowAssembler
    Port that aggregates TCP segments for a single flow into ordered byte streams.
    FlowContext
    Immutable context describing the flow orientation for a TCP segment.
    FlowDirectionService
    Tracks flow orientation (client/server) using SYN observation and fallback heuristics.
    FrameDecoder
    Port that decodes captured link-layer frames into TCP segments for higher-level processing.
    FrameDecoderLibpcap
    Decodes Ethernet frames captured via libpcap into simplified TcpSegment instances.
    HttpFlowAssemblerAdapter
    Basic HTTP flow assembler that forwards non-empty TCP payloads as ByteStream slices, preserving direction and timestamps.
    HttpKafkaPersistenceAdapter
    Kafka persistence adapter that serializes HTTP MessagePair instances into JSON and publishes them to Kafka.
    HttpKafkaPosterPipeline
    Kafka-backed poster pipeline that consumes serialized HTTP message pairs and renders poster reports.
    HttpMessageReconstructor
    Lightweight HTTP/1.x reconstructor that buffers per-direction payloads and emits complete header+body messages when Content-Length allows.
    HttpPairingEngineAdapter
    Simple FIFO pairer assuming client -> request and server -> response semantics.
    HttpPosterPipeline
    File-based poster pipeline for HTTP message pairs.
    HttpProtocolModule
    ProtocolModule implementation for HTTP traffic.
    HttpSegmentSinkPersistenceAdapter
    Writes HTTP message pairs in the legacy SegmentSink blob/index format.
    HttpSessionExtractor
    Port-friendly session extractor mirroring the legacy implementation.
    IoMode
    IO strategies available to RADAR pipelines.
    JnrLibpcap
    JNR-FFI bindings for the subset of libpcap APIs used by RADAR.
    JnrPcapAdapter
    JNR libpcap adapter with zero per-packet heap allocation: uses a per-thread reusable scratch buffer that grows as needed.
    KafkaPosterOutputAdapter
    Kafka poster adapter that publishes formatted PosterOutputPort.PosterReport payloads to a Kafka topic.
    KafkaSegmentReader
    Kafka consumer wrapper that streams SegmentRecord instances from a topic.
    KafkaSegmentRecordReaderAdapter
    Bridges KafkaSegmentReader to the assemble use-case segment reader contract.
    LegacyHttpAssembler
    Deprecated.
    LegacySegmentPersistenceAdapter
    Persists reconstructed message pairs using the legacy segment binary format.
    LiveCli
    Launches the live RADAR capture pipeline from CLI key-value arguments.
    LiveProcessingUseCase
    Executes live packet capture and protocol reconstruction, persisting message pairs in real time.
    Main
    RADAR CLI dispatcher that routes to subcommands.
    MessageEvent
    Event emitted by a protocol reconstructor representing a logical request or response.
    MessageMetadata
    Metadata attached to protocol messages, including transaction correlation identifiers.
    MessagePair
    Correlated request/response pair produced by the pairing engine.
    MessagePairer
    FIFO-based pairing helper that matches request and response message events.
    MessageReconstructor
    Port responsible for reconstructing protocol messages from ordered TCP byte streams.
    MessageType
    Direction of a reconstructed protocol message.
    MetricsPort
    Metrics abstraction for recording counters and distribution samples.
    NoOpFlowAssembler
    Flow assembler implementation that never emits data.
    NoOpMetricsAdapter
    Metrics adapter that discards all observations.
    NoOpPersistenceAdapter
    Placeholder persistence adapter used until legacy sinks are migrated.
    PacketSource
    Port that provides captured raw frames from a network interface or trace.
    PairingEngine
    Port that pairs protocol message events into request/response groupings.
    PayloadFlowAssemblerAdapter
    Generic payload assembler that treats each TCP segment payload as an independent byte stream.
    Pcap
    High-level wrapper around libpcap operations used by RADAR.
    Pcap.PacketCallback
    Callback invoked for each captured packet.
    PcapException
    Checked exception thrown when libpcap operations fail.
    PcapHandle
    Represents an activated libpcap handle.
    PcapPacketSource
    PacketSource adapter backed by the existing JNR libpcap implementation.
    PcapPkthdr
    JNR representation of libpcap's struct pcap_pkthdr.
    PersistencePort
    Port that persists reconstructed protocol message pairs to durable storage or downstream systems.
    PosterCli
    Entry point for rendering reconstructed protocol traffic into poster outputs.
    PosterConfig
    Configuration for poster pipelines that render reconstructed protocol traffic.
    PosterConfig.DecodeMode
    Controls how aggressively poster pipelines decode transfer/content encodings.
    PosterConfig.ProtocolConfig
    Per-protocol poster configuration covering file and Kafka targets.
    PosterOutputPort
    Output port for poster pipelines that emit rendered protocol transcripts.
    PosterOutputPort.PosterReport
    Immutable representation of a rendered poster output.
    PosterPipeline
    Protocol-specific pipeline that reads reconstructed message pairs and emits poster reports.
    PosterUseCase
    Coordinates protocol-specific poster pipelines that render reconstructed traffic for reporting.
    ProtocolDetector
    Detects the application protocol for a flow based on early payload and port hints.
    ProtocolId
    Known application protocols handled by RADAR.
    ProtocolModule
    Pluggable module describing how to detect and reconstruct a specific protocol.
    RawFrame
    Immutable representation of a captured link-layer frame.
    ReorderingFlowAssembler
    Flow assembler that buffers TCP segments per direction and emits in-order byte streams.
    SegbinGrepCli
    CLI utility that scans recorded segment files for a byte sequence and prints matches with context.
    SegmentBinIO
    Minimal segment file format compatible with legacy segbin (SGB1) files.
    SegmentBinIO.Reader
    Reader for SGB1 segment files ordered lexicographically by file name.
    SegmentBinIO.Writer
    Writer for SGB1 segment files with optional rolling support.
    SegmentCaptureUseCase
    Coordinates packet capture by polling a PacketSource, decoding frames, and persisting TCP segments.
    SegmentFileSinkAdapter
    File-based SegmentPersistencePort that writes captured segments using the SGB1 format.
    SegmentIoAdapter
    Convenience wrapper for reading and writing RADAR segment binary files.
    SegmentIoAdapter.Reader
    File reader for SegmentRecord sequences using SegmentBinIO.
    SegmentIoAdapter.Writer
    File writer for SegmentRecord sequences using SegmentBinIO.
    SegmentKafkaSinkAdapter
    Kafka-backed SegmentPersistencePort that streams serialized TCP segments to a topic.
    SegmentPersistencePort
    Port that stores captured TCP segment records for later processing.
    SegmentRecord
    Immutable representation of a captured TCP segment persisted by RADAR.
    SegmentSinkAdapter
    Simple NDJSON sink for message pairs used during migration from legacy tooling.
    SegmentSinkAdapter
    Temporary adapter writing message pairs as NDJSON entries.
    SystemClockAdapter
    ClockPort implementation backed by System.currentTimeMillis().
    TcpSegment
    Simplified TCP segment abstraction exposed by the flow assembler.
    TimeVal
    JNR representation of POSIX struct timeval.
    Tn3270FlowAssemblerAdapter
    Flow assembler for TN3270 that forwards non-empty payloads without reordering.
    Tn3270KafkaPersistenceAdapter
    Kafka persistence adapter that serializes TN3270 MessagePair instances into JSON and publishes them to Kafka.
    Tn3270KafkaPosterPipeline
    Kafka-backed poster pipeline that consumes TN3270 message pairs and renders poster reports.
    Tn3270MessageReconstructor
    Reconstructs TN3270 Telnet records into high-level message events.
    Tn3270PairingEngineAdapter
    Host-first pairing for TN3270 where the host response typically precedes the terminal request.
    Tn3270PosterPipeline
    File-based poster pipeline for TN3270 message pairs.
    Tn3270ProtocolModule
    ProtocolModule implementation for TN3270 traffic.
    Tn3270SegmentSinkPersistenceAdapter
    Writes TN3270 message events into blob/index files compatible with the HTTP sink.
    TransactionId
    Generates ULID-style opaque identifiers for correlating protocol messages.
